backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining label settings, user profiles, and print job submission with authorization checks and serial-duplication prevention.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, titles, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and printing changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text document summarizing key frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root wiring password session, error boundary handling, and conditional lock screen vs. main shell rendering.
frontend/src/audio/soundSystem.ts: Zustand-powered sound settings store with custom sound management and Web Audio playback utilities.
frontend/src/auth/passwordSession.ts: LocalStorage-backed password session utilities with expiry, credential checks, and password validation.
frontend/src/auth/PasswordSessionProvide: React context managing password sessions with unlock/lock logic and session hydration validation.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application layout with header, footer, and tabbed navigation for scan, settings, devices, and diagnostics pages.
frontend/src/components/BackendAvailabil: Shows a destructive badge when the backend is unavailable based on backend availability state.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reload option when a component throws.
frontend/src/components/HeaderDeviceCont: Displays printer connection status and an optional screen wake-lock toggle.
frontend/src/components/SerialTypeCounte: Renders counters for label print types based on diagnostics data and configured prefix mappings.
frontend/src/components/SoundEffectsSett: UI for selecting, testing, uploading, and managing built‑in or custom sound effects per event type.
frontend/src/config/lockScreenConfig.ts: Provides the expected lock screen password, using an environment variable override if set.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting print jobs, fetching print history, and increasing print counts with backend availability handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: React hook managing screen wake lock support, activation, persistence, and visibility-based re-requesting.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, focus states, and touch-friendly sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global CSS.
frontend/src/printing/barcodePreview.ts: Generates simple deterministic SVG barcodes using custom pattern logic as a jsbarcode alternative.
frontend/src/printing/cpclBarcodeDiagnos: Utilities validating barcode data, position, and height while logging warnings and errors.
frontend/src/printing/cpclBarcodeMapping: Provides CPCL barcode type mappings, fallback handling, and supported-type lookup utilities.
frontend/src/printing/cpclGenerator.ts: Builds CPCL label commands, performing validation, barcode sizing, logging, and fallback handling.
frontend/src/printing/cpclLayoutAdjustme: Functions estimating barcode width and adjusting or clamping X positions to prevent clipping.
frontend/src/printing/LabelPreview.tsx: Component rendering an interactive label preview with zoom, barcode generation, and layout calculations.
frontend/src/screens/LockScreen.tsx: Password lock screen that validates input, triggers session unlock, and handles error and loading states.
frontend/src/screens/PasswordSessionWiri: Displays a configuration error message with guidance and a refresh button when the password session system is misconfigured.
frontend/src/services/printerService.ts: Zustand store managing USB printer connection, CPCL sending, test prints, and logging.
frontend/src/services/usbCpclTransport.t: WebUSB utilities for discovering, connecting to, and communicating with CPCL-compatible USB printers.
frontend/src/state/backendAvailabilitySt: Zustand store tracking backend availability, last errors, and timestamps.
frontend/src/state/diagnosticsStore.ts: Persistent diagnostics store tracking scan/print counts and per-type counters.
frontend/src/state/labelSettingsStore.ts: Persistent store for label layout settings with BigInt-safe storage, defaults, and migration from older formats.
frontend/src/state/logStore.ts: Persistent log store keeping up to 1000 structured log entries with metadata.
frontend/src/state/printHistoryStore.ts: Stores print history and provides reprint functionality using the printer service.
frontend/src/state/useLabelSettingsHydra: Hook that reports when label settings have finished hydration from localStorage.
frontend/src/tabs/DevicesTab.tsx: Provides UI and logic for connecting, disconnecting, and test-printing with a USB CPCL printer using WebUSB.
frontend/src/tabs/DiagnosticsTab.tsx: Displays scan/print statistics, print history with reprint functionality, and filtered logs for diagnostics.
frontend/src/tabs/LabelSettingsTab.tsx: Manages label configuration, layout editing, prefix mappings, import/export, previewing, and test printing of label settings.
frontend/src/tabs/ScanPrintTab.tsx: Handles serial scanning, validation, label type detection, CPCL generation, backend submission, and printing workflow.
frontend/src/utils/barcodeSettingsValida: Validates barcode types and layout settings to ensure CPCL barcodes have valid scale and printable dimensions.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Detects Internet Computer canister-stopped errors and formats IC rejection errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsErrors.t: Parses label settings update errors into clearer messages, including admin, network, prefix, and canister-stopped cases.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsImportEx: Handles exporting label settings with BigInt serialization and importing with migration from old formats plus validation.
frontend/src/utils/labelTypes.ts: Defines built‑in and custom label types and utilities for naming, extracting, and listing them.
frontend/src/utils/scanPrintErrors.ts: Formats backend and printer errors into concise messages and detects non‑blocking backend conditions.
frontend/src/utils/serialNormalization.t: Normalizes scanned serials by trimming whitespace and removing scanner suffix characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters in browser routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current features, and pending requests for the test‑label feature.
